Elita/Windlord:

Elita yewed and cuddle agains Mailce while she sucked her tiny 
finger, and slowly was falling sleep. Windlord chuckled watching 
Malice as baby sitter and he said "Well this little fierce and cute 
fox, is Camoflage"said while he took ibn arms at Cam"The youngest 
members of Maximals and this little one"said while he looked to 
Elita "It's elita, daugher of our leader, Rodimus Prime and 
Nighlight"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice looked down at the bot that walked in.  he shifted Elita to 
the crook of one arm and picked up Camoflage with the other.  He 
held her in the crook of that arm so she could see everyone.
> "Elita, Camoflage, this is my half sister Organics.  She came all 
the way here to see little ol' me."
> Organics grinned.  He somehow remained the same after three 
centuries.  Not just in personality, but his, and her own face 
looked almost exactly the way it did three hundred years later.  She 
pushed all the rumors about his temper and ruthlessness aside, they 
couldn't possibly be true.
>  
> Could they?
> "Hello little ones.  As Neutronics said, I'm Organics."
> She stepped a litle closer and inspected the children Malice was 
carrying.
> "Oh, they're so cute!  Are they yours?" she asked as innocently as 
she could.
> Malice stars at his sister with a blank stare for a moment.  
> "WHAT?  OF COURSE NOT!  I just happen to be baby sitting, that's 
all!"
> Malice had been in an incredibly good mood as of late, but his 
sister knew which button to push.  But she also knew how to make it 
up to him, too.
> "Oh don't be so grouchy.  Here, I'll take care of these two so you 
and your new lady friend can do what ever you were before." she 
said, holding out here ams.
> Malice looked at the children in is arms.
> "Well, what do you two want?  Stay with me or go and play with 
her?"
> 
> 
> shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> Camoflage:
> 
> She ran through the corridors and outside.  
> A short time later, she went back inside with a big look of relief 
on her face plates.  She went back to Malice's room and saw the 
other bots there. "What'd I miss?" 
> 
> Wolfblade::
> She had seen Camoflage run out and walk back in. She chuckled to 
herself as she went to the lab. "Well, at least the little one is 
house broken."
> 
> "Their defenses are broken!  Let the slaughter BEGIN!" -Megatron, 
TF:TM
